alert.note: Alert for Gallia (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:50PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gallia and central Mason Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 350 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gallipolis, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Racine, New Haven, Hartford City, Henderson, Leon, Gallopolis Ferry and Letart. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
